name: Ragdoll
description: The ultimate cuddle buddy! This floofy friend will flop in your arms like a plush toy and purr their way into your heart.

name: British Shorthair
description: The cat version of a royal guard: always dignified, slightly chonky, and ever so unimpressed by your antics.

name: Persian
description: The drama queen of the cat world—long fur, fancy vibes, and a side-eye sharp enough to cut through steel.

name: Moggy
description: Your everyday superhero cat—scrappy, adorable, and a total master of napping in the most awkward places.

name: Siberian
description: Fluffy as a snowstorm but warmer than a hot cocoa. This adventurer looks majestic but secretly loves belly rubs.

name: American Shorthair
description: The classic all-American kitty! Equal parts playful and chill, they’re basically the golden retriever of cats.

name: Exotic Shorthair
description: A Persian in pajamas! Cute, squishy, and lazy enough to make you jealous of their chill lifestyle.
